chapters.title: The Noble's Secret
chapters.content:
Lady Yuki appeared to live a perfect life as a noble heiress, but she harbored a dark secret - she was cursed with a condition that caused her to age rapidly when exposed to sunlight. Confined to her mansion during the day, she only emerged at night to live her life.

When she met Hiroshi, a night watchman who worked near her estate, she was drawn to his kindness and the way he saw her as more than just a wealthy noble. But their romance was doomed from the start - Yuki's condition meant she would age decades in a single day of sunlight.

Despite the impossibility of their love, they continued to meet in secret, knowing that each stolen moment might be their last.

chapters.title: Eternal Night
chapters.content:
As Yuki's condition worsened, she began to disappear for longer periods, hiding her rapid aging from Hiroshi. When he finally discovered the truth, he was devastated but refused to abandon her.

Hiroshi sought out ancient texts and mystical remedies to cure Yuki's curse, eventually learning of a ritual that could transfer the curse to another person. Without hesitation, he offered to take her burden, even though it would mean he would suffer the same fate.

In a bittersweet ending, their love transcended even the boundaries of mortality as they chose to face their fate together rather than apart.
